channel.title: [Pi] "open interface" command method?
channel.description:
Hey guys, so lemme catch you up: I'm trying to make a command to open the Makeover Mage interface, and this is the code (keep in mind I'm pretty new to this, everybody has to start somewhere right?) [code] if (playerCommand.startsWith("makeover") && c.teleBlockLength == 0) { c.method.openRsInterface(3559); c.sendmessage("Design your avatar."); [/code]
And I get these errors: [code] src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:139: error: cannot find symbol c.method.openRsInterface(3559); ^ symbol: variable method location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:140: error: cannot find symbol c.sendmessage("Opened Makeover interface."); ^ symbol: method sendmessage(String) location: variable c of type Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Anybody know the command?

OH okay. Thanks dude!

item.title: [Pi] "open interface" command method?

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[tt]sendMessage(string);[/tt]

Notice the uppercase M.

@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[tt]c.getPA().openInterface(integer);[/tt]
and

item.title: [Pi] "open interface" command method?
item.dc:creator: @Itz_Alister_Yo Itz Alister Yo
item.description:
@Itz_Alister_Yo wrote:

Hey guys, so lemme catch you up:
I’m trying to make a command to open the Makeover Mage interface, and this is the code (keep in mind I’m pretty new to this, everybody has to start somewhere right?)

if (playerCommand.startsWith("makeover") && c.teleBlockLength == 0) { c.method.openRsInterface(3559); c.sendmessage("Design your avatar.");

And I get these errors: src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:139: error: cannot find symbol c.method.openRsInterface(3559); ^ symbol: variable method location: variable c of type Client src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:140: error: cannot find symbol c.sendmessage("Opened Makeover interface."); ^ symbol: method sendmessage(String) location: variable c of type Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Anybody know the command?
